verbs.description: [ARG1: sophomore] [V: arrested] [ARGM-TMP: after bringing gun to cordova high school] a cordova high school sophomore was arrested monday after he brought a gun to school principal jerad hyden said in a note to parents the student brought the gun to campus in his backpack hyden said another student reported the rumor of a gun at school to administrators and staff and a school resource officer were able to confiscate the weapon the school said rancho cordova police will take the lead on the investigation and there was no rancho cordova rancho cordova california cordova high school cordova high gun high school officer kcra principal jerad hyden cordova high school rancho cordova california
